about.title: Welcome to Movie Nest!
about.description: Movie Nest is your go-to platform for discovering, sharing, and enjoying movies with friends and fellow fans. Dive into a world of cinema, connect with others, and make every movie night special!

features.exploreDesc: Browse trending, top-rated, and hidden gem movies. Find detailed info, cast, reviews, and more.
features.socialDesc: Share your favorite movies, rate what you watch, and see what your friends are enjoying.
features.collabDesc: Join a vibrant community of movie lovers. Discuss, recommend, and create your own watchlists!

faq.a: Movie Nest is a platform for discovering, sharing, and discussing movies with a friendly community.

faq.q: How do I join Movie Nest?
faq.a: Just sign up for free and start exploring movies, sharing favorites, and connecting with others!
Yes, Movie Nest is completely free to use.

faq.q: How do I add movies to my favorites?
faq.a: Click the 'Add to Favorites' button on any movie page after logging in.

faq.q: Can I make my own watchlists?
faq.a: Yes! You can create and manage your own movie watchlists to keep track of what you want to see.

about.socialDesc: Follow us on social media for the latest movie news, recommendations, and community events.
about.collabDesc: Become part of Movie Nest and help shape the best movie experience for everyone!
about.finalDesc: Sign up now and start discovering, sharing, and enjoying movies with Movie Nest!

About.feature1Description: Create a Movie Chill account to save your favorite movies and series, share recommendations with your friends, and see what other community members are watching.
About.feature2Description: Movie Chill is an open-source project hosted on GitHub. We welcome contributions from developers worldwide to improve and extend the application's functionality. If you'd like to contribute, check out our GitHub repository and leave a star to show your support.
About.feature3Description: Connect with other movie lovers and discover new films together.
About.faq1Answer: Movie Nest is a platform for discovering, sharing, and discussing movies with a friendly community.
About.faq2Question: How do I join Movie Nest?
About.faq2Answer: Just sign up for free and start exploring movies, sharing favorites, and connecting with others!
About.faq3Answer: Yes, Movie Nest is completely free to use.
About.faq4Question: How do I contribute to Movie Nest?
About.faq4Answer: You can suggest features, report bugs, or collaborate with other movie lovers to help Movie Nest grow!

description.highlight1: is a creative and open-source platform
description.line3: Built with love by film lovers for film lovers.

endlessExploration.title: Endless Exploration
endlessExploration.description: Explore a vast library of films and series from The Movie Database (TMDb). Whether you're looking for timeless classics, recent blockbusters, or hidden gems, we have something for everyone.
